title: Foreign secy, Amb Nong Rong cut cake to celebrate China’s 72nd national day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 1 (APP): Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood on Friday reaffirmed the resolve to take the time-tested ‘all-weather strategic cooperative partnership’ between Pakistan and China to a higher level.
The foreign secretary stated this at a ceremony to mark the 72nd national day of China, held here at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
The foreign secretary and Chinese Ambassador Nong Rong cut the cake on the occasion to celebrate the day.
The national day of China commemorates the formal proclamation of the establishment of the People’s Republic of China on 1 October 1949.
